synthesis_conditions.additional_information: ZJU-620(Al) has uniform micropore size of 8.37 ± 0.73 Å and specific surface area of 1347 m2 g-1. It can be stable in water at pH ranging from 3 to 12.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: ambient for water and boiling water treatments, unspecified for HCl and NaOH treatments
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: After treatment, ZJU-620(Al) retains structural integrity and exhibits excellent chemical and thermal stability.
ZJU-620(Al) can be regenerated by desorption at 378 K and reused for BTEX adsorption at least five times with only 0.23% loss of adsorption amounts.
